Episodes.Writer: Chuck Lorre, Bill Prady, Jim Reynolds
Episodes.Actors: Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons, Kaley Cuoco
Episodes.Plot: Amy gets inadvertently caught in the middle of a fight between Sheldon and Penny over a chair. Leonard tries to add some spice to his long-distance relationship with Priya.

Episodes.Title: The Pulled Groin Extrapolation
Episodes.Writer: Chuck Lorre, Bill Prady, Steven Molaro
Episodes.Actors: Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons, Kaley Cuoco
Episodes.Plot: Leonard accompanies Amy to a colleague's wedding. Howard tries to convince Bernadette to live with his mother after they get married.

Episodes.Title: The Wiggly Finger Catalyst
Episodes.Writer: Chuck Lorre, Bill Prady, Steven Molaro
Episodes.Actors: Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons, Kaley Cuoco
Episodes.Plot: Penny sets up Raj with a deaf friend, not knowing that she's actually a gold digger, and Sheldon decides to let his minor decisions rest on the roll of the dice.

Episodes.Title: The Russian Rocket Reaction
Episodes.Writer: Chuck Lorre, Bill Prady, Eric Kaplan
Episodes.Actors: Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons, Kaley Cuoco
Episodes.Plot: Sheldon takes offense when Leonard wants to attend a party with Wil Wheaton, while Bernadette tries to block Howard's opportunity to go into outer space.

Episodes.Title: The Rhinitis Revelation
Episodes.Writer: Chuck Lorre, Bill Prady, Steven Molaro
Episodes.Actors: Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons, Kaley Cuoco
Episodes.Plot: Sheldon gets upset when his mother comes to visit but refuses to cook for him and attend physics lectures.

Episodes.Title: The Good Guy Fluctuation
Episodes.Writer: Chuck Lorre, Bill Prady, Steven Molaro
Episodes.Actors: Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons, Kaley Cuoco
Episodes.Plot: Sheldon tries to get into the spirit of Halloween by trying to scare the guys after they prank him. Leonard seeks Penny's advice when an attractive comic book artist takes an interest in him.

Episodes.Title: The Isolation Permutation
Episodes.Writer: Chuck Lorre, Bill Prady, Steven Molaro
Episodes.Actors: Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons, Kaley Cuoco
Episodes.Plot: Amy is hurt when Penny and Bernadette go bridesmaid dress shopping without her, so she turns to a reluctant Sheldon for comfort.

Episodes.Title: The Ornithophobia Diffusion
Episodes.Writer: Chuck Lorre, Bill Prady, Steven Molaro
Episodes.Actors: Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons, Kaley Cuoco
Episodes.Plot: Sheldon tries to overcome his fear of birds, while Leonard and Penny attempt to hang out together strictly as friends.

Episodes.Title: The Flaming Spittoon Acquisition
Episodes.Writer: Chuck Lorre, Bill Prady, Jim Reynolds
Episodes.Actors: Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons, Kaley Cuoco
Episodes.Plot: When Stuart asks Amy on a date, Sheldon considers having a more serious relationship with her. Meanwhile, the guys become obsessed with a new card game involving Wild West heroes and witches.

Episodes.Title: The Speckerman Recurrence
Episodes.Writer: Chuck Lorre, Bill Prady, Steven Molaro
Episodes.Actors: Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons, Kaley Cuoco
Episodes.Plot: Leonard confronts the man who bullied him in high school, while Penny realizes she did her fair share of tormenting in the past.

Episodes.Title: The Shiny Trinket Maneuver
Episodes.Writer: Chuck Lorre, Bill Prady, Steven Molaro
Episodes.Actors: Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons, Kaley Cuoco
Episodes.Plot: Penny helps Sheldon work on his relationship with Amy when he trivializes one of her accomplishments. Howard is irked by Bernadette's dislike of children.

Episodes.Title: The Recombination Hypothesis
Episodes.Writer: Chuck Lorre, Bill Prady, Steven Molaro
Episodes.Actors: Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons, Kaley Cuoco
Episodes.Plot: Leonard and Penny contemplate reviving their romantic relationship.

Episodes.Title: The Beta Test Initiation

Episodes.Actors: Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons, Kaley Cuoco
Episodes.Plot: Leonard and Penny develop a system to ensure their dates go smoothly. Raj finally finds a woman he can talk to - the virtual assistant on his mobile phone.

Episodes.Title: The Friendship Contraction
Episodes.Writer: Chuck Lorre, Bill Prady, Steven Molaro
Episodes.Actors: Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons, Kaley Cuoco
Episodes.Plot: Leonard signs out of his roommate agreement, reducing himself and Sheldon to mere acquaintances, while Howard tries to think of a cool astronaut nickname for himself.

Episodes.Title: The Vacation Solution
Episodes.Writer: Chuck Lorre, Bill Prady, Steven Molaro
Episodes.Actors: Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons, Kaley Cuoco

Episodes.Title: The Rothman Disintegration
Episodes.Writer: Chuck Lorre, Bill Prady, Steven Molaro
Episodes.Actors: Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons, Kaley Cuoco
Episodes.Plot: Sheldon battles Kripke for a coveted office at the university. Penny receives a very unusual gift from Amy.

Episodes.Title: The Werewolf Transformation
Episodes.Writer: Chuck Lorre, Bill Prady, Steven Molaro
Episodes.Actors: Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons, Kaley Cuoco
Episodes.Plot: Sheldon wreaks havoc when he tries to get a haircut from his regular barber, who is ill. Howard runs into a few problems with astronaut training.

Episodes.Writer: Chuck Lorre, Bill Prady, Steven Molaro
Episodes.Actors: Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons, Simon Helberg
Episodes.Plot: Sheldon has to choose between joining Amy at her aunt's birthday party or playing videogames all weekend with the guys.

Episodes.Actors: Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons, Kaley Cuoco
Episodes.Plot: Raj gets quite a surprise when he asks his parents to set him up on a date. Penny buys Leonard and Sheldon a pair of Star Trek keepsake collectibles.

Episodes.Actors: Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons, Kaley Cuoco
Episodes.Plot: NASA cancel, and later reinstate Howard's mission into space, coinciding with his wedding. Leonard inadvertently jeopardizes his relationship with Penny.

Episodes.Title: The Countdown Reflection
Episodes.Writer: Chuck Lorre, Bill Prady, Steven Molaro
Episodes.Actors: Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons, Kaley Cuoco
